General.Name: HJ ShipBuilding & Construction Co Ltd
General.Description: HJ Shipbuilding & Construction Co., Ltd. engages in the defense and special shipbuilding, civil engineering, construction/housing, and plant construction business in South Korea. The company was founded in 1937 and is based in Busan, South Korea. As of September 3, 2021, HJ Shipbuilding & Construction Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Dongbu Corporation.
